title: Community link is not resolved and there is no way to unfurl it
body:
# Bug Report

## Description

Happens randomly and in this case is no way to reach the community.

## Steps to reproduce
- User A: create a token-gated community (in a particular case with these permissions):

![Status Desktop 2023-10-31 13-02-37](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/4557972/e5125ba3-0edc-41e7-a91a-2038c5bd45e3)

- User A: add User B to contacts
- User A: add User B to the token-gated community

#### Expected behavior
User B: Can see the community info from the invite

#### Actual behavior
1) The link to the community shows "Community data cannot be shown yet"
2) Community invite is not unfurled

https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/4557972/b3ff40a2-6249-4a15-9070-f82220172a5c

Video from the other user (as a confirmation that it is not only my issue): 

https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/4557972/59a502ed-9f1a-4409-8331-8dc0716e6821



### Additional Information

- Status desktop version: nightly 31/10/23
- Operating System: Mac OSx 13.2.1
- Logs: 
[Archive.zip](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/files/13216060/Archive.zip)
[geth_new.log](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/files/13216117/geth_new.log)
